OOC: Does anybody know of a BeastWars or BeastMachine episode download site 
i missed alot of both.

::Koj::
"Inu lets head back to base we have work to do." ((Hitting the fast forward 
button))Back at the base Koj lays out the blue prints of the alliance base. 
Ok this is the radius defense the reports read little since nobody ever had 
time to do internal recon the main reactor is here the shields and defense 
and sweep ends here their air patrol sweep is limited."

::Inu::
"I take it your going in right here. Here the data on the warriors also the 
enegry Crystals/Cubes in the base raduis."

::Koj::
"HMMMMMMMM since only 6 maximals ever made in and out alive I'm about to 
make it 7 heres the plan. In Docking bay 8 there are blank transport pods 
the were bots without sparks that the ship must have carryied here. We need 
about 4 of them.

::Inu::
"HMMMMM but what good are they if there blanks?"
